name: A Gouda Voyage to the Moon
name_original: A Gouda Voyage to the Moon
description:
A Lunar Jam Joint.

This game can be played with:

  • Keyboard and mouse
  • Mouse

WASD to move
Q & E to rotate
F to eat edible walls
Spacebar to shoot
Or use a mouse for control via the UI

Explore and eat your way through the cave as you search for the key to revitalizing the Dairy Council.

-

The Dairy Council convened to discuss new ideas for products to sell.
 They determined nothing left on Earth falls under the dairy purview. But there might be hope. On the moon.

As the newest member of the council, you are tasked with going to the moon to find a new product for the dairy counsel.

The dairy counsel builds a rocket to take you to the moon.
Once the dangerous contraption is built, you buckle in and hope for the best.
Your rocket has no windows. Only lit by the flashlight provided to you.
Suddenly an impact, and a deep bellowing moan. The hatch door opens, and you find yourself inside an intricate cave.
